Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/55th
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 55th, Racine, 59th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to a street blockage nr Ashland/55th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 55th, Racine, 59th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to a street blockage near Ashland/55th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
